title: Auto-select top match during fuzzy search
description: When typing in search, automatically select the top match in the filtered list and load its content into the editor instantly.
design:
Approach: Implement Notational Velocity / fzf style auto-selection.
1. Typing: As the user types, the filteredNotes[0] should automatically become the selectedNoteID.
2. Clearing: If the search is cleared (empty string), the current selection should remain active (fzf-like persistence).
3. Implementation: Use onChange(of: searchText) to trigger selection updates. Ensure loadSelectedNote handles task cancellation to avoid race conditions during rapid typing.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Typing in search automatically selects the first match\n- [ ] Editor updates immediately to show content of auto-selected note\n- [ ] Clearing search preserves the current selection (if still in list)
close_reason: Completed: Implemented auto-selection of top match during fuzzy search with proper empty search handling
